SELECT * FROM checkout AS c1 INNER JOIN car AS c2 ON(c1.`alcarid` = c2.`hid`) INNER JOIN maintainxm AS c3 ON(c1.`albusinessid` = c3.`xid`) INNER JOIN driver AS c4 ON(c1.`aldriveid` = c4.`oid`)
